title: Dude....Adult Swim's April Fool's was a new episode of RICK AND MORTY!
body:
Watching Adult Swim and the episode seemed unfamiliar, hmm, I looked at the TV guide and it says S2E3. Heh, I guess my memory sucks but I just looked it up and it's fucking NEW.
http://www.denofgeek.com/us/tv/rick-and-morty/263380/rick-and-morty-season-3-air-date-released-episode-currently-streaming-on-adult-swim

Direct link: http://www.adultswim.com/videos/streams
